about_the_game:
The only way out is the way through this world.

In search of a seemingly superior opponent, make decisions that not only change the course of the game but also yourself.



Tactical turn-based battles on challenging terrain are the heart of the game. Deploying your units in a well-planned formation will help you draw the line of battle along the terrain to your advantage.

The journey

Get supported by other characters who are helping you to beat the enemies along your way. Each brings his or her own flaws and characteristics to the table, which may be helpful, harmful, or just funny in themselves.




Turnbased isometric tactics

Battles take place in a 3D environment where the higher ground is just as important as blocking paths or hiding from range weapons.
Having trained your troops in a proper variety of jobs and equipping them with specialized abilities will make the difference in a fight. Balance your troops and find the best mix of physical fighters and magical support.




Class-System

Throughout the game, your teammates and the mercenary you recruit will be able to learn different Job classes and gain new abilities that way. Depending on the professions you choose, your characters will gain different qualities. A set of over 200 abilities is available for you to learn and use in battle. Choose wisely to form mediocre 'all-rounders' or to form units into experts in one profession. Each path you can take has its advantages and disadvantages.

Dragon Knights

The path of your journey will be blocked by evil guys and monsters. The court guard of the villain knows fighters, rangers, and mages of any kind. They are supported by evil souls creatures that will execute any of their commands. The Dragon Knights are the bodyguards of the game's villain. The army of soulless henchmen armed with weapons of war, stuffed into shiny armor, flooding the land like a plague.

short_description: „The Simple Balance“ is a tactical turn-based RPG. Explore a dark fantasy world and defeat enemies with magic spells, mighty weapons, and learned abilitys. Manage your team and deploy them promisingly to win the battle. Find out what is going on in this mysterious world and why you are here.
supported_languages: English, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, French, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
